name: Levers (itch)
description:
This game is for the BenBonk Game Jam #3, you are a little player in a some place, you need to solve the puzzle / activate the correct lever to go to the next level, if you activate the wrong one, something bad will happen.

WASD to move.

E to interact.

Music : www.bensound.com

SFXs : www.sounds-resource.com
